Logic Analysis: Contains Parser class with parse method to convert Lisp code into an AST
Contains Evaluator class with evaluate method to process the AST according to Lisp semantics
Contains Environment class to handle variable scopes and bindings
Contains REPL class with start method for interactive execution
Contains Errors class with LispError, SyntaxError, NameError, and ArityError for comprehensive error handling
Contains the main function to start the REPL
Shared Knowledge: The REPL class in repl.py will interact with Parser, Evaluator, and Environment classes. Error handling will be managed by the Errors class in errors.py.
Anything UNCLEAR: Clarify if there are any specific Lisp dialects or additional features beyond the core functionalities that need to be supported.
